data.message: Dear Facebook! I have a problem, my facebook page send a virus messages to my friends. What can I do?  Please answer as soon as possible! Thanks.

replies.message: Hey Ferenc. If your account is sending spam, reset your password. Malware can also sometimes cause your account to post things without your knowledge. To learn more, please visit: on.fb.me/1fTr2lt. -Elizabeth

DEAR FACEBOOK I JUST WAS LISTENING TO A SONG AND I PUT I DO NOT OWN THE RIGHTS TO THIS SONG AND YOU GUYS DID NOT POST MY VIDEO.   THIS IS GETTIN OUT OF HAND I THINK U GUYS MAY HAVE BLOCKED ME FROM GOIN LIVE & I HAVE DID NOTHING WRONG.
